casebody.data:
VAN BUREN CHARTER TOWNSHIP, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
VISTEON CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156018
COA: 331789 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 31, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Townships Association and the Government Law Section of the State Bar of Michigan to file a joint brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on August 29, 2018, is accepted for filing.
